targetDossier.tooltip: Select the entity you want to create a relationship with
targetDossier.title: Related Dossier Selection
targetDossier.description: Search for and select any dossier in the system to establish a formal relationship. The relationship will be tracked bidirectionally.
formatRequirements: Type at least 2 characters to search

relationshipType.tooltip: The nature of the connection between these entities
relationshipType.title: Relationship Type
relationshipType.description: Choose the type that best describes how these two entities are connected. This affects how the relationship appears in network visualizations and reports.

types.member_of: Indicates entity A is a member of organization B (e.g., country is member of international forum)
types.participates_in: Entity A actively participates in entity B's activities
types.bilateral_relation: Formal bilateral diplomatic or economic relationship
types.related_to: General relationship that doesn't fit other categories
types.represents: Entity A represents entity B in some capacity
types.hosted_by: Event or entity hosted by another organization
types.involves: Entity is involved in an engagement or event
types.participant_in: Participant in an event or forum
types.observer_of: Observer status in a forum or organization

status.title: Relationship Status
status.description: Track whether this relationship is currently active, has become historical, or has been formally terminated.

statuses.active: The relationship is currently in effect and ongoing
statuses.historical: The relationship existed in the past but is no longer active

effectiveFrom.title: Effective From Date
effectiveFrom.description: The date when this relationship officially began. Leave empty if unknown or if the relationship has always existed.

effectiveTo.tooltip: When this relationship ends (leave empty for ongoing)
effectiveTo.title: Effective To Date
effectiveTo.description: The date when this relationship ended or is scheduled to end. Leave empty for ongoing relationships that have no defined end date.

notes.tooltip: Additional context or details about this relationship
notes.title: Relationship Notes
notes.description: Add any relevant details, context, or documentation references that help explain this relationship. Notes are searchable and appear in relationship summaries.

type.tooltip: Select the category that best describes this entity
type.title: Dossier Type Selection
type.description: Each type has specific fields and visualization options. Choose the type that best represents the entity you're documenting.

types.country: National entities and sovereign states. Includes geographic data, capital cities, ISO codes, and regional classifications.
types.organization: Government agencies, NGOs, private sector companies, and international organizations. Includes contact info and organizational hierarchy.
types.forum: International forums, councils, and multilateral bodies. Supports member tracking and meeting schedules.
types.engagement: Meetings, consultations, workshops, and other scheduled interactions. Links participants, outcomes, and follow-ups.
types.theme: Topics, policy areas, or themes that cross-cut multiple entities. Used for categorization and research.
types.working_group: Task forces, committees, and working groups within organizations or forums.
types.person: Individual contacts, delegates, or officials. Includes biographical info and position history.

nameEn.title: English Name
nameEn.description: Enter the official English name for this entity. This will be used in English language displays and reports.

nameAr.title: Arabic Name
nameAr.description: Enter the official Arabic name for this entity. This will be used when the interface is in Arabic.

status.title: Entity Status
status.description: Indicates whether this entity is currently active, temporarily inactive, or archived for historical reference.

statuses.active: Entity is currently operational and can be referenced
statuses.inactive: Entity exists but is temporarily not operational
statuses.archived: Entity is kept for historical reference only

sensitivityLevel.title: Sensitivity Level
sensitivityLevel.description: Controls who can view and edit this dossier. Higher levels require additional permissions.

isoCode.title: ISO Country Code
isoCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 standard country code used for international identification.
formatRequirements: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 (2 letters) or alpha-3 (3 letters)

organizationType.title: Organization Type
organizationType.description: Classifies the organization for filtering and reporting purposes.

types.government: Government ministries, agencies, and public sector bodies
types.ngo: Non-governmental organizations and civil society groups
types.academic: Universities, research institutions, and academic bodies

engagementType.title: Engagement Type
engagementType.description: Categorizes the nature of this engagement for scheduling and reporting.

types.meeting: Formal or informal meeting between parties
